name: Tola
description:
After years of searching, Tola, the world's greatest explorer and adventurer, has finally discovered the lost Challenge Temple, a subterranean labyrinth built by an ancient civilization to reward the brave and clever.  If Tola can solve its arcane puzzles, untold fortunes await her.

Tola is an all-new Nintendo Entertainment System action-puzzle game inspired by Eggerland, Flappy, and Sokoban.  It's not just a "retro-style" game--it's an actual NES game that can be played on real hardware!  It was developed using Retro Puzzle Maker and features all-original level designs, graphics, and music.
